DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX 12 Color Palette - Neon/ Metallic (10 gm)
DescriptionData.Description: Diamond FX 12 Color Neon/Metallic Palette includes strongly pigmented water-based face paint in 6 Metallic colors and 6 Neon colors, 10 gm each. 10 gm palettes are easily refillable. Colors included are: Neon Pink, Neon Orange, Neon Yellow, Neon Green, Neon Blue, Neon Purple, Metallic Red, Metallic Gold, Metallic Silver, Metallic Green, Metallic Blue and Metallic Violet. Diamond FX 12 Color palette also comes with a #3 Round Brush and a #2 Flat Brush.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes high quality water-based face paint in 6 Metallic colors and 6 Neon colors, 10 grams each.

Includes colors: Neon Pink, Neon Orange, Neon Yellow, Neon Green, Neon Blue, Neon Purple, Metallic Red, Metallic Gold, Metallic Silver, Metallic Green, Metallic Blue and Metallic Violet. Also includes a #3 Round Brush and a #2 Flat Brush.
Do not use Diamond FX Neon Colors around eyes and lips.
Apply either with a sponge or a brush. Requires only a small amount of water. Removes easily with soap and water.
Perfect for night clubs and parties where black light is very popular these days.
